ComicInfo.Title: Part Four Dopplegangbang
ComicInfo.Summary: Part Four Dopplegangbang: Spike battles opponents created out of people from his past, holding the attention of the people at Smile Time until Lorne can save the day.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-29 00:47:42. [Issue ID 371805]
ComicInfo.Characters: Puppet Wesley,Betta George,Fauna,Mrs. Konikoff,Ratio Hornblower,Puppet Gunn,Snuff the Magic Dragon,Puppet Angelus,Puppet Fred/Illyria (Half Fred and half Illyria),Puppet Cordelia,Puppet Lorne,Puppet Conner,Puppet Spike,Sod (Demon, Cameo),Puppet Drusilla,Tok Shinobu
